description: Designs, builds, and maintains software products and systems across web, mobile, and backend platforms.

decision_preparation.title: Decision & Preparation
steps: Choose PCM (Maths) and focus on fundamentals
Prepare for JEE / State CET or equivalent
Build coding basics with Python/JavaScript and logical reasoning

career_entry.title: Career Entry
steps: Enroll in B.Tech (CSE/IT) or allied degree
Complete core CS courses: DSA, OS, DBMS, Networks, OOP
Do internships or industry projects each summer
Publish or maintain 2-3 projects (web, mobile, or backend)

growth_specialization.title: Growth & Specialization
steps: Pick a track: backend, frontend, mobile, data/ML, or DevOps
Earn role-relevant certs (cloud, Kubernetes, security as needed)
Work on scalable systems and reliability practices
Mentor juniors and contribute to engineering communities

short_term.label: SHORT TERM (0-1 years)
milestones: Crack JEE / State CET (or institute entrance)
Join B.Tech CSE/IT or equivalent program

mid_term.label: MID TERM (2-4 years)
milestones: Master data structures & algorithms for interviews
Build an open-source or portfolio project with users

long_term.label: LONG TERM (5+ years)
milestones: Specialize in a depth area (architecture, ML, security, SRE)
Demonstrate system design and scalability expertise

tips_for_success: Keep a consistent DSA + systems practice rhythm alongside coursework
Maintain a visible portfolio (GitHub/portfolio site) with clean READMEs
Intern early and often; convert one internship into a PPO if possible
Learn version control, testing, CI/CD, and basic cloud early
Network via hackathons, meetups, and referrals; seek regular code reviews
